title: Nid is the new Lee Sin?
body:
People who play them generally find them fun as hell, but people who verse them think they're cancer.


lol

replies.body:
nid is nid. lee sin was the new nid.

so nid is the new new nid....doesnt make sense.

nid has always been cancer to vs. the rework made her way more annoying when fed.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vPeE5ArW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-06T07:16:48.696+0000)
>
> nid is nid. lee sin was the new nid.
> 
> so nid is the new new nid....doesnt make sense.
> 
> nid has always been cancer to vs. the rework made her way more annoying when fed.

I'm just saying that Nid is the new Lee Sin in terms of the comparison between those who play them and those who verse them. :P

And yeah her rework did make her more annoying when fed...that just hit me..
